io.odysz.semantic.jserv

Class ServPort<T extends AnsonBody>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • io.odysz.semantic.jserv.ServPort<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - any subclass extends AnsonBody.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnInsert, AnQuery, AnSession, AnUpdate, Dataset, Datasetier, DocsTier, Echo, HeartLink, JFileServ, SemanticTree, SUserSrv, UsersTier

    public abstract class ServPort<T extends AnsonBody>
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

    Base serv class for handling json request.

    Servlet extending this must subclass this class, and override onGet() and onPost().
    Author:
    odys-z@github.com
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
